title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: download, build and run Llama-2, Mistral, Gemma, CodeLlama and other LLMs locally via a single CLI or REST API.

title: ollama-python
summary: First-party Python library that wraps Ollama’s REST API with sync/async clients and streaming support.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Node and browsers (with fetch) to talk to a local Ollama server.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that adds Ollama as a local LLM provider for chains, agents and retrieval pipelines.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web dashboard (React/Flask) for chatting, managing models, multi-user support; runs entirely in-browser.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with builder-style API, streaming, and image support; available on Maven Central.

title: ollama-cli-csharp
summary: .NET CLI and library that wraps Ollama endpoints; supports chat, completion, embeddings and model management.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community Ruby gem for interacting with Ollama; covers chat, pull, list and delete operations.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async bindings to Ollama’s REST API with tokio/hyper.

title: chainlit-ollama-example
summary: Cookbook repo showing how to plug Ollama into Chainlit for a local chat-with-PDF app.

title: privategpt-ollama
summary: Branch of PrivateGPT that uses Ollama as the LLM/embedding backend for fully-private RAG.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.0 integration offering OllamaGenerator and OllamaChatGenerator components.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Community Neovim plugin that swaps GitHub Copilot for a local Ollama model via ollama.nvim.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with optional GPU node-selector and PVC model cache.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Official Docker image and compose snippets for CPU & CUDA runtimes; multi-arch (amd64/arm64).

title: ollama-rag-chatbot (YouTube)
summary: Step-by-step tutorial building a RAG chatbot with Ollama, LangChain and Chroma on a laptop.

title: r/ollama – Local LLM ecosystem discussion
summary: Active subreddit for sharing models, tools, benchmarks and troubleshooting Ollama setups.

title: ollama-npm – unofficial JS wrapper
summary: Lightweight community npm package exposing fetch-based functions for chat and completions.

title: ollama-py on PyPI
summary: Official PyPI listing for ollama-python with wheels for macOS, Linux, Windows.
